TEXT.English: Wat Preah Pisnulok
[ICON_BULLET]Artists can also be hired using Priest slots.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Künstler können auch mithilfe von Priesterstellen eingestellt werden.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Wat Preah Pisnulok[COLOR_REVERT] adds an additional population point in all cities. Further, it allows Artists to be hired using Priest slots. It increases the odds of its city generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
Blue Mosque
TEXT.German: Blaue Moschee

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Blue Mosque[COLOR_REVERT] removes all unhappiness from the city in which it is built. It increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
Borobudur

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Borobudur[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to hire three [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Priest[COLOR_REVERT] specialists and adds additional production to all of your [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Priest[COLOR_REVERT] specialists. It also increases the odds of its city generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
Brandenburg Gate

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Brandenburg Gate[COLOR_REVERT] doubles the amount of great general points you receive inside your cultural borders. It also increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].
Wembley

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Wembley[COLOR_REVERT] provides your civilization with seven [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hit Football Event[COLOR_REVERT] resources (which provide happiness). It increases the odds that its city will generate a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mahabodhi[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Buddhist Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Buddhism[COLOR_REVERT], with a limit of 20 gold. It also spreads [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Buddhism[COLOR_REVERT] throughout the world and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
CERN Research Complex

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]CERN Research Complex[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increases the scientific output of its city. It also allows you to hire three [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Scientist[COLOR_REVERT] specialists and increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].
Temple of Kukulkan
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temple of Kukulkan[COLOR_REVERT] increases all cities' defenses by 25%%. It improves the odds of its city generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
Saint Peter's Basilica

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Saint Peter's Basilica[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Catholic Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Catholicism[COLOR_REVERT]. It also spreads [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Catholicism[COLOR_REVERT] thoughout the world and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
CN Tower
San Kong
TEXT.German: San Kong

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]San Kong[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Confucian Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Confucianism[COLOR_REVERT], with a limit of 20 gold. It also spreads [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Confucianism[COLOR_REVERT] thoughout the world and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Der [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]San Kong[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Konfuzianischer Schrein[COLOR_REVERT]) produziert in allen Städten, die den [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Konfuzianismus[COLOR_REVERT] praktizieren, 1 Gold/Runde bis zu einem Maximum von 20 Gold. Außerdem verbreitet er den [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Konfuzianismus[COLOR_REVERT] in aller Welt und erhöht die Chancen einer Stadt, einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Großen Propheten[COLOR_REVERT] hervorzubringen.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]CN Tower[COLOR_REVERT] creates a free [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Broadcast Tower[COLOR_REVERT] in every city. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
Dome of the Rock
The Empire State Building
TEXT.German: Das Empire State Building

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Provides [ICON_GOLD] bonus equal to city's population.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Produziert [ICON_GOLD] entsprechend der Bevölkerung seiner Stadt.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Empire State Building[COLOR_REVERT] provides a gold bonus equal to the population of the city in which it's built. It also increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT]
[ICON_BULLET]Golden Ages Consume at most Three Great People
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Goldene Zeitalter verbrauchen höchstens drei große Persönlichkeiten

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Eiffel Tower[COLOR_REVERT] grants a culture boost and also limits the amount of great people consumed in a golden age to 3. Its city has an improved chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Colossus[COLOR_REVERT] adds extra commerce to all water tiles in your coastal cities. It also increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].
The Colosseum

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Colosseum[COLOR_REVERT] increases its city's production when creating military units and grants experience points to units built in this city. It also increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
The Great Bath
TEXT.German: Das Große Bad

TEXT.English: The Great Cothon

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Cothon[COLOR_REVERT] add a bonus production to every water tile in the city in which it's constructed. It increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Library[COLOR_REVERT] gives its city two free [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Scientist[COLOR_REVERT] specialists. It increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Lighthouse[COLOR_REVERT] gives one additional trade route and one additional trade routes to all coastal cities. It also increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].
[ICON_BULLET]Reduced Enemy Movement Speed Within the Walls.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Barbarian Units Take Damage within the Walls
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Geringere Bewegung feindlicher Einheiten innerhalb der Mauern.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Barbarische Einheiten nehmen Schaden innerhalb der Mauern

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Wall[COLOR_REVERT] reduces enemy speed within your borders and also damages barbarians within your borders. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
Harmandir Sahib

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Harmandir Sahib[COLOR_REVERT] grants experience points to troops built in all cities with your state religion. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
[ICON_BULLET]Provides fresh water to the city[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All newly founded cities receive one additional point of population
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Versorgt die Stadt mit Süßwasser[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Alle neu gegründeten Städte erhalten einen zusätzlichen Bevölkerungspunkt

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]All units built in cities with state religion receive +2 experience
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Alle Einheiten, die in Städten mit Staatsreligion ausgebildet werden, erhalten +2 Erfahrung

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]City defense increases culture output in all cities[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1[ICON_CULTURE] per level of every fully fortified unit in the city
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Stadtverteidigung erhöht Kulturausstoß in allen Städten[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1[ICON_CULTURE] pro Level für jede vollständig befestigte Einheit in der Stadt

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hollywood[COLOR_REVERT] provides your civilization with seven [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hit Movies[COLOR_REVERT] resources (which provide happiness). It increases the odds that its city will generate a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
[ICON_BULLET]State Religion buildings are constructed twice as fast
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Gebäude der Staatsreligion werden doppelt so schnell gebaut

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]All trade routes are counted as foreign
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]All Handelsrouten werden als ausländisch gewertet

TEXT.English: Himeji Castle
TEXT.German: Die Burg von Himeji

TEXT.English: Ishtar Gate
Lubyanka
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Lubyanka[COLOR_REVERT] adds additional espionage to all of your specialists. It also increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].
Khajuraho

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Masjid al-Haram[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Islamic Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Islam[COLOR_REVERT], with a limit of 20 gold. It also spreads [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Islam[COLOR_REVERT] thoughout the world and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
St. Basil's Cathedral

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]St. Basil's Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT] adds additional espionage to all buildings of your state religion and it increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].
The Leaning Tower

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Leaning Tower[COLOR_REVERT] increases the rate at which your civilization generates [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great People[COLOR_REVERT]. It increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
Machu Picchu
[ICON_BULLET]Provides +2[ICON_GOLD] per Peak in City Radius

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Machu Picchu[COLOR_REVERT] provides 2 gold for every [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Peak[COLOR_REVERT] in the city's radius. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mausoleum of Maussollos[COLOR_REVERT] increases the length of your Golden Ages by fifty percent. It also increases the odds of its city generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
La Mezquita

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pentagon[COLOR_REVERT] grants experience points to troops built in all cities and increases the chance that its city will generate a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].
The Hagia Sophia
Church of the Anastasis

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Church of the Anastasis[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Orthodox Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Orthodoxy[COLOR_REVERT], with a limit of 20 gold. It also spreads [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Orthodoxy[COLOR_REVERT] thoughout the world and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mt. Rushmore[COLOR_REVERT] decreases war weariness in all cities in your civilization and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Notre Dame[COLOR_REVERT] increases the happiness of all of your cities. It increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Oracle[COLOR_REVERT] gives one free technology of your current or previous era, and it increases the odds of its city generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
[ICON_BULLET]Builder Receives a Great Person
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Erbauer erhält eine große Persönlichkeit

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]La Mezquita[COLOR_REVERT] gives 2 free [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Priest[COLOR_REVERT] specialists and grants the builder a free great person. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].
[ICON_BULLET]+2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] for Water Improvements[NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Requires 20 Water Tiles in City Radius[REVERT_COLOR]

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Moai Statues[COLOR_REVERT] add bonus production to all [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fishing Boats[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]High Sea Fishing Boats[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Whaling Boats[COLOR_REVERT] in your civilization. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Khajuraho[COLOR_REVERT] doubles the construction speed of the buildings of your state religion. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Parthenon[COLOR_REVERT] grants access to all [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Government[COLOR_REVERT] Civics. It also increases the odds of its city generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ishtar Gate[COLOR_REVERT] increases war weariness in the cities of those who go to war against its builder. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Himeji Castle[COLOR_REVERT] makes city defence increases culture output and makes all fully fortified units provide +1 culture. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].
The Hanging Gardens

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hanging Gardens[COLOR_REVERT] improves the health of your city and adds an additional population point in all cities. It increases the odds of its city generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
Vishwanath
TEXT.German: Vishwanath

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Vishwanath[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hindu Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hinduism[COLOR_REVERT], with a limit of 20 gold. It also spreads [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hinduism[COLOR_REVERT] thoughout the world and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Der [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Vishwanath[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hindu-Schrein[COLOR_REVERT]) produziert in allen Städten, die den [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hinduismus[COLOR_REVERT] praktizieren, 1 Gold/Runde bis zu einem Maximum von 20 Gold. Außerdem verbreitet er den [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hinduismus[COLOR_REVERT] in aller Welt und erhöht die Chancen einer Stadt, einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Großen Propheten[COLOR_REVERT] hervorzubringen.

TEXT.English: The Grand Canal
TEXT.German: Kaiserkanal

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Grand Canal[COLOR_REVERT] adds extra commerce to all river tiles in your city. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
Floating Gardens
TEXT.German: Schwimmende Gärten

TEXT.English: Garden
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Garden[COLOR_REVERT], the Babylonian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ampitheatre[COLOR_REVERT], provides bonus health.
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Floating Gardens[COLOR_REVERT] give a large food bonus as well as increasing its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].
Forbidden Palace
[ICON_BULLET]Civic Upkeep Reduced by 33%
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Staatsformen-Unterhalt um 33% reduziert

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forbidden Palace[COLOR_REVERT] reduces civic maintenance costs. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].
Porcelain Tower
TEXT.German: Porzellanturm

TEXT.English: All Saints' Church

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]All Saints' Church[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Protestant Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Protestantism[COLOR_REVERT], with a limit of 20 gold. It also spreads [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Protestantism[COLOR_REVERT] thoughout the world and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Porcelain Tower[COLOR_REVERT] gives 2 free [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Merchant[COLOR_REVERT] specialists and counts all trade routes in your civilization as foreign. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].
The Pyramids
[ICON_BULLET]Hurry Unhappiness Does Not Increase with the Amount of Sacrificed Population
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Die Unzufriedenheit durch Sklaverei steigt nicht mit der Anzahl der geopferten Bevölkerung

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pyramids[COLOR_REVERT] makes slavery unhappiness not increase with the amount of population sacrificed, makes workers build improvements faster and centers the world map. They also increase their city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
The Red Fort
TEXT.German: Das Rote Fort

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Red Fort[COLOR_REVERT] gives 2 free specialists. It also increase their city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
Graceland

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Graceland[COLOR_REVERT] provides your civilization with seven [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hit Singles[COLOR_REVERT] resources (which provide happiness). It increases the odds that its city will create a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
San Marco Basilica

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]San Marco Basilica[COLOR_REVERT] gives 2 trade routes and increases trade route yield by fifty percent. It increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sistine Chapel[COLOR_REVERT] causes each specialist in every city to generate culture and increases the culture bonus provided by buildings of your state religion. It increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Space Elevator[COLOR_REVERT] increases spaceship part production in all of your cities and increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Spiral Minaret[COLOR_REVERT] gives all buildings of your state religion a gold bonus. It increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Statue of Liberty[COLOR_REVERT] gives all cities in your civilization one free specialist. It increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Statue de la Liberté[COLOR_REVERT] fait apparaître un spécialiste dans toutes vos villes et augmente les chances d'apparition d'un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]ingénieur illustre[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Durch den Bau der [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Freiheitsstatue[COLOR_REVERT] erhalten alle Städte Ihrer Zivilisation einen Spezialisten. Darüber hinaus erhöhen sich die Chancen der Stadt, einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Großen Ingenieur[COLOR_REVERT] hervorzubringen.
TEXT.Italian: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Statua della Libertà[COLOR_REVERT] concede a tutte le città della tua civiltà uno specialista gratis. Inoltre, aumenta la probabilità di generare un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Grande Ingegnere[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Estatua de la Libertad[COLOR_REVERT] otorga un especialista gratis a todas las ciudades de la civilización. Incrementa también las posibilidades de que en su ciudad se genere un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Gran ingeniero[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]No city resistance on conquest[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Increases military unit production speed by 25% in all cities with pagan temples
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Kein Widerstand nach Stadteroberung[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Erhöht die Produktionsgeschwindigkeit militärischer Einheiten in allen Städten mit heidnischen Tempeln um 25%

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Statue of Zeus[COLOR_REVERT] removes city resistance on conquest and increases military production speed in cities with pagan temples. It increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
Great Sphinx
[ICON_BULLET]Great prophets can create great works like great artists.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Große Propheten können große Kunstwerke erstellen, genau wie große Künstler.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Sphinx[COLOR_REVERT] allows Great Prophets to create Great Works. It increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Taj Mahal[COLOR_REVERT] begins a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Golden Age[COLOR_REVERT] for your civilization. It increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
The Temple of Artemis

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temple of Artemis[COLOR_REVERT] increases its city's trade route income and gives a free [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Priest[COLOR_REVERT]. It increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].
The Temple of Heaven
TEXT.German: Himmelstempel

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temple of Heaven[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Taoist Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Taoism[COLOR_REVERT], with a limit of 20 gold. It also spreads [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Taoism[COLOR_REVERT] thoughout the world and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Der [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Himmelstempel[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Taoistischer Schrein[COLOR_REVERT]) produziert in allen Städten, die den [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Taoismus[COLOR_REVERT] praktizieren, 1 Gold/Runde bis zu einem Maximum von 20 Gold. Außerdem verbreitet er den [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Taoismus[COLOR_REVERT] in aller Welt und erhöht die Chancen einer Stadt, einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Großen Propheten[COLOR_REVERT] hervorzubringen.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Dome of the Rock[COLOR_REVERT] provides one free [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Priest[COLOR_REVERT] specialist and doubles the Shrine gold limit from 20 to 40. It increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
[ICON_BULLET]Doubles the revenue limit of all your shrines
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Verdoppelt die Einnahmegrenze aller Ihrer Schreine

TEXT.English: Terracotta Army
[ICON_BULLET]Unlimited Experience from Barbarian Units[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Victories Against Barbarians Contribute to Great General Birth
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Unbegrenzte Erfahrung von barbarischen Einheiten[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Siege gegen Barbaren tragen zur Geburt großer Generäle bei

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Terracotta Army[COLOR_REVERT] removes the limit of experience gained from barbarians and allows barbarians to contribute to Great General birth. It also increases its city's production when creating military units and increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
Theodosian Walls

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Theodosian Walls[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's defenses against pre-gunpowder units. It also increases their city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
Topkapi Palace
Three Gorges Dam

Spanish.Text: la Presa de las Tres Gargantas:las Presas de las Tres Gargantas

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Three Gorges Dam[COLOR_REVERT] provides clean power to all cities on the same continent. It increases the odds that its city will generate a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
[ICON_BULLET]Additional Foreign Culture is Converted on City Conquest
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Bei der Eroberung gegnerischer Städte wird zusätzliche Kultur konvertiert

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Topkapi Palace[COLOR_REVERT] increases the amount of culture converted on city conquest. It also increase their city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].
Trafalgar Square

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Shwedagon Paya[COLOR_REVERT] grants access to all [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Religious[COLOR_REVERT] Civics. It also increases the odds of its city generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
[ICON_BULLET]Requires a naval unit of level three or higher.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Benötigt eine Marineeinheit der Stufe drei oder höher.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Trafalgar Square[COLOR_REVERT] enables ships to be built much faster and the ships start off with additional experience points. It also increase its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].
University of Sankore

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]University of Sankore[COLOR_REVERT] gives all buildings of your state religion a research bonus. It increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Versailles[COLOR_REVERT] begins a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Golden Age[COLOR_REVERT] for your civilization. It increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]United Nations[COLOR_REVERT] triggers [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Diplomatic Victory[COLOR_REVERT] elections. It guarantees that you will be a candidate in those elections and increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].
Westminster Palace
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Westminster Palace[COLOR_REVERT] reduces the cost of hurrying production and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].
Adur Farnbag

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Adur Farnbag[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Zoroastrian Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zoroastrianism[COLOR_REVERT], with a limit of 20 gold. It also spreads [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zoroastrianism[COLOR_REVERT] throughout the world and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hagia Sophia[COLOR_REVERT] increases the production of all state religion buildings and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hagia Sophia[COLOR_REVERT] erhöht die Produktion aller Gebäude der Staatsreligion und erhöht die Chancen einer Stadt, einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Großen Ingenieur[COLOR_REVERT] hervorzubringen.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temple of Solomon[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Jewish Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Judaism[COLOR_REVERT], with a limit of 20 gold. It also spreads [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Judaism[COLOR_REVERT] thoughout the world and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Salomons Tempel[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Jüdischer Schrein[COLOR_REVERT]) produziert in allen Städten, die das [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Judentum[COLOR_REVERT] praktizieren, 1 Gold/Runde bis zu einem Maximum von 20 Gold. Außerdem verbreitet er das [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Judentum[COLOR_REVERT] in aller Welt und erhöht die Chancen einer Stadt, einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Großen Propheten[COLOR_REVERT] hervorzubringen.
